Articles.Content: Whenever I try to load a save that was taken in the map, and sometimes just when I try to load a save. It finishes loading, and instead of going into the game,  the screen goes black. I know the game's still running, because I can hear the music. The only way to get out of this screen is to long press the power button, restarting my computer.
Another thing that happens is sometimes, it just crashes normally, booting me out of the game.
And now sometimes, it gets stuck on "creating vessel".
so far my game has never crash; it freezes and makes me quit the game manually
